title: Understanding Paranoid Personality Disorder
text: Paranoid personality disorder involves a pervasive pattern of behavior. Consider what this pattern might involve in terms of how individuals perceive and interact with others.

title: Key Characteristics of Paranoid Personality Disorder
text: Think about the key characteristics of paranoid personality disorder. What are the main traits that define this disorder?

hintAnswer: pervasive pattern of distrust and suspicion of others
title: Identifying the Correct Pattern
text: Which of the following patterns is most associated with paranoid personality disorder?
choices: pervasive pattern of distrust and suspicion of others
pattern of detachment from social relationships and a limited range of emotional expression
odd or eccentric behavior, unusual beliefs or magical thinking, social and interpersonal difficulties, and a tendency toward perceptual and cognitive distortions
false belief that coincidental events relate to oneself
